part1.1-paragraph: For the past years we've been going to events with our other product: a Blockchain Wallet that allows you to make blockchain transactions face to face using a proprietary card, making your phone a POS.
part1.2-paragraph: Regardless of how futuristic our discussions were, at some point people asked for our business cards. For us it felt a bit off brand to talk about decentralized payments in cashless societies and hand over the equivalent of cash for information: a paper business card.
part1.3-paragraph: What followed next was the part where you end up searching your LinkedIn profile on strangers' smartphones because they can't spell your name.

part2.1-paragraph: Using our knowledge of NFC cards and data privacy, we created a product that eliminates this friction between digital business cards and paper business card users. Our NFC Business Cards had no initial market purpose, but as soon as we used it, people asked us how to get their own, and this is how Cardanti was born.
part2.2-paragraph: Just like ourselves, the product has both a physical and a digital side: your Cardanti Card and Cardanti Business Profile. We built it to be as close as possible to the experience of offering paper business cards. As with using paper business cards, people using Cardanti don't need an app to exchange contact information.
part2.3-paragraph: Cardanti enhances networking. It allows people who just met to easily add themselves in their digital contact lists using a smart business card.
part2.4-paragraph: Cardanti is a unique business card solution, it was designed to compete on the luxury business cards and premium business cards market.

part3.1-paragraph: Our mission is to make Cardanti the best version of business cards and eliminate the need to print paper cards. We believe sustainability is a matter of now, so for every of our eco business cards sold, a tree is planted.

row.h2: We created a premium business card that comes in the development of the sales process of the company's agents. The card comes with some extra benefits added to the Smart Cardanti business card and the Cardanti business profile:

card1.p: Accesul datelor este rapid și easy to share. Datele se pot accesa de oriunde după scanare, nu mai este nevoie de cartea de vizită în format fizic, iar datele se păstrează pe landing page, fără să se piardă precum în cazul cărților de vizită obișnuite.

card2.p: Design-ul cărților de vizită este premium, customizat cu elementele identității de brand ale companiei – logo.

card3.p: Am creat o interfață care centralizează toate datele tuturor cardurilor și vine cu o evidența a performanței acestora. Fiecare agent primește un card nominal care va transmite date specifice: în ce locații a fost utilizat, câte persoane au accesat cartea de vizită, traficul generat în anumite zone de tip evenimente, business meetings. Astfel, creează un status de performanță a echipei și oferă datele de contact într-un mod rapid, eficient și ușor de accesat.

card4.p: Se pot crea un număr personalizat de cărți de vizită, în funcție de dimensiunea echipei.

card5.p: Datele de contact ale membrului se pot edita și actualiza constant în funcție de creșterea și schimbarea în carieră și la nivelul companiei.

section4.h2: To cover for all your brand's needs we offer
section4.h1: Two ways of making your custom business cards.

row1.h2: We place your logo and brand colors on our Timeless Cards
row1.li1: You benefit from a neutral and elegant business card design that lasts forever while also representing your brand in the best possible way.
row1.li2: Straightforward solution with no back and forth on design, fastest way to order business cards online.

row2.h2: Our business card mock-up, your design
row2.li1: We have prepared a Cardanti Card template with all the necessary information.
row2.li2: Download the template, design your cards using our instructions and get back to us.

section1.h2: Fill in the template and order one in less than a minute.

card1.p: You only need one card to share your contact details be it in face to face or online meetings.

card2.p: You don't have to install anything. Cardanti works through the smartphone's Internet Browser.

card3.p: Your contact details can be edited at any time. Phone, Address, Social Links, Videos, Presentations.

section4.h1: Which Cardanti is right for you?

part1.li1: Choose Light Theme, or go to the Dark Side
part1.li2: Six beautifully selected colors to choose from

part2.li1: Custom business cards to match your brand
